thread.title: TV | The Graham Norton Show
thread.title_full: TV | The Graham Norton Show - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: TV | The Graham Norton Show
text: So it's Saturday night and you still haven't worked up the courage to head out. You don't have the energy, we get it, but you've got a great excuse, Graham Norton's lineup is top class this week. You'll have a whole hour of trying to figure out just why it is you don't like Anne Hathaway, as well seeing Robert De Niro brush aside any interesting question with a grumbled laugh out of the corner of his mouth. If you're lucky enough you'll remember exactly where it is you know Kenneth Branagh from, and Tom Hiddleston will be there to save the whole thing just by being Tom Hiddleston. Music from The Shires, nope, we've no idea who they are either, but we like the sound of a country-pop duo.
